channel.title: Prayer xp rate
channel.description:
where do i change prayer xp ? its not in client.java nor potions.java
help!!

item.title: Prayer xp rate
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

thx guys , i’m using pk planet base ( 317 )

but i need to find burying xp , not used on object

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer xp rate
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

I found it in client.java. I’m using a delta based server. It looked like this: (this is for using bones on altars)
if(UsedOnObjectID == 10638){
if(ItemID == 526){
deleteItem(526, 1);
addSkillXP(8getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
setAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}
if(ItemID == 532){
deleteItem(532, 1);
addSkillXP(8getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
setAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}
if(ItemID == 536){
deleteItem(536, 1);
addSkillXP(8*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
setAnimation(894);
lowGFX(247,0);
}

Read full topic
